metadata.synopsis: Steel Watcher AD noticing gnomes at south checkpoint at WYR. Used in case if player skips the checkpoint and sneaks behind it.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load BGO_Main_A, come to larian://bookmark?name=BGO_WyrmCrossing_StartCrossingBridge&mod=GustavDev&level=BGO_Main_A&camPos=3.670112;76.643791;28.564262&camTarget=3.623620;76.210350;29.464245but don't go near guards, instead T your character further behind the checkpoint.

0.speaker: GROUP_SteelWatchers
0.text: THREAT DETECTED. SPECIES: GNOME. EXTERMINATION AUTHORISED.
